item.title: 建筑商中国国际金融有限公司（CIFI）提出关键债务条款，减值幅度高达 85
item.description: 陷入困境的开发商中国国际金融有限公司（CIFI Holdings Group Co.【原文：Distressed developer CIFI Holdings Group Co. said it has reached an agreement with a key creditor group on some terms of a restructuring plan that could cut the principal on its debt by as much as 85%, a reversal from the company’s expectations of “no haircut” a year ago.】

item.title: 在紧张局势升级之际，习近平将进行2019年以来的首次欧洲之行
item.description: 在贸易、间谍指控和北京支持俄罗斯等一系列问题引发紧张局势之际，中国国家主席习近平将在五年左右的时间里首次访问欧洲大陆。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping will visit the European continent for the first time in about five years as tensions mount over a range of issues including trade, spy allegations and Beijing’s support for Russia.】

item.title: 交易员陷入日元 "宾果游戏"，狂躁波动破坏日本假期
item.description: 亚洲交易日早些时候，日元突然暴跌至 1 美元兑 160 日元左右，当时凯尔-罗达（Kyle Rodda）正在墨尔本 Capital.com 办公室的 34 楼。交易大厅顿时炸开了锅。【原文：Kyle Rodda was on the 34th floor of the Capital.com office in Melbourne when the yen suddenly plunged to around 160 per dollar early in the Asia day. The trading floor exploded.】

item.title: 政府取消能源援助，西班牙通胀加速
item.description: 由于政府继续取消有助于抑制能源成本飙升的支持措施，西班牙通胀率连续第二个月加速上升。【原文：Spanish inflation quickened for a second month as the government continued to remove support that had helped keep a lid on soaring energy costs.】

item.title: Spinneys 迪拜 IPO 定价最高，筹资 3.75 亿美元
item.description: 高端连锁超市 Spinneys 在迪拜的首次公开募股预计将以最高价发行，募集资金 13.8 亿迪拉姆（约合 3.75 亿美元），显示出对阿拉伯联合酋长国罕见的私营企业上市的强劲需求。【原文：High-end supermarket chain Spinneys’ Dubai initial public offering is expected to price at the top of the range and raise 1.38 billion dirhams ($375 million), showing strong demand for a rare private sector listing in the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 日元汇率跌至 1 美元兑 160 日元后暴涨引发干预言论
item.description: 日元的突然反弹引发了人们的猜测，因为早些时候日元汇率跌破了人们密切关注的 160 美元兑 1 美元的水平，日本官员进行了干预。【原文：The sudden rebound in the yen sparked speculation Japanese officials had intervened after the currency earlier slid past the closely-watched 160-per-dollar level.】

item.title: 中国人民银行将对债券投资的警告扩大到地区性银行
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，中国央行已建议一些地区性贷款机构减少超长期债券投资，以降低风险。【原文：China’s central bank has advised some regional lenders to curtail their ultra-long bond investments to mitigate risks, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 普依格将首次公开募股指导价定为每股 24.50 欧元，处于区间上限
item.description: Puig Brands SA 和这家西班牙香水公司的创始家族将首次公开募股的价格定在了市场定价范围的最高点，这是今年迄今为止欧洲最大的一次上市。【原文：Puig Brands SA and the Spanish fragrance company’s founding family set the price for an initial public offering at the top of a marketed range, in Europe’s biggest listing so far this year.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）通过仓库交易增加迪拜房地产投资组合
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）收购了一家迪拜公司房地产部门的控股权，从而在全球最热门的商业地产市场之一获得了一块优质仓储空间。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management bought a controlling stake in a Dubai-based firm’s real estate unit, securing a slice of prime warehousing space in one of the world’s hottest commercial property markets.】

item.title: 印度交易所股价下跌，2000 万美元期权费被追讨
item.description: 印度市场监管机构要求 BSE 有限公司补缴衍生品合约费用，该公司股价周一暴跌达 19%，创下有记录以来的最大盘中跌幅。【原文：Shares of BSE Ltd. plunged as much as 19% on Monday, their biggest intraday decline on record, after India’s markets regulator requested it pay back-pay fees charged on derivatives contracts.】

item.title: 日本神田在被问及是否干预时表示 "暂时无可奉告
item.description: 日本最高货币官员拒绝就东京是否干预货币市场发表评论，因为周一货币市场大幅波动，美元兑日元汇率下跌了 2%。【原文：Japan’s top currency official declined to comment on whether Tokyo had intervened in the currency market Monday following a sharp move in the market that sliced 2% off the dollar-yen exchange rate.】

item.title: 安巴尼的 Jio Financial 计划聘请 StanChart 高管担任部门首席执行官
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的新金融服务公司计划聘请渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）的印度国家经理担任其一个部门的首席执行官，因为该公司正寻求在一个信贷需求快速增长的国家站稳脚跟。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani’s new financial services firm plans to tap Standard Chartered Plc’s India country manager as its chief executive officer of one of its units, according to people familiar with the matter, as it seeks to entrench itself in a nation where demand for credit is growing rapidly.】

item.title: 墨西哥总统加尔韦斯在辩论中发起攻势，寻求东山再起
item.description: 墨西哥反对党总统候选人科希特尔-加尔韦斯（Xochitl Galvez）在第二场总统辩论中加大了对领跑者克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）的攻击力度，这是她争取更多选民支持的最后机会之一。【原文：Mexico’s opposition presidential candidate Xochitl Galvez ramped up the attacks against frontrunner Claudia Sheinbaum in the second presidential debate, in one of her last opportunities to increase voter support.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数在 9 月以来最好的一周后将取得更多涨幅
第一季度业绩强劲，BBVA 首席执行官上调盈利预期
item.description: 毕尔巴鄂比斯开亚阿根廷银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）在第一季度业绩超出预期后，上调了 2024 年的利润预期。【原文：Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA raised its profit guidance for 2024 after it beat estimates in the first quarter.】

item.title: 比特币跌至一周低点，2024 年加密货币复兴停滞不前
item.description: 比特币和更广泛的加密货币市场周一出现回调，一些投机者在美联储本周召开的会议前感到紧张，这次会议可能指向更高更长期的利率。【原文：Bitcoin and the wider crypto market retreated on Monday, with some speculators on edge ahead of a Federal Reserve meeting this week that may point to higher-for-longer interest rates.】

item.description:
市场对喜忧参半的经济新闻和收益作出了反应，因为他们认为情况可能更糟。【原文：

Markets are reacting to mixed economic news and earnings on the understanding that it could be worse.

item.title: 政治削弱预算决心，欧洲债务再次上升
item.description: 欧洲一些负债最多的政府今年将面临痛苦的清算，因为它们削减借贷的雄心与政治现实发生了冲突。【原文：Some of Europe’s most indebted governments are heading for a painful reckoning this year as their ambitions to cut down on borrowing collide with political reality.】

item.title: 中国推出新的旅行许可，澳门赌场股票大涨
item.description: 在中国当局推出新的旅游许可以刺激澳门旅游业之后，澳门赌场运营商的股票周一大涨。【原文：Shares in Macau casino operators rallied on Monday after Chinese authorities introduced new travel permits in an effort to boost the city’s tourism.】

item.title: 香港恒生指数从一月低点跃升 20%，向牛市迈进
item.description: 由于海外资金流入，香港股市延续了本月的强劲反弹势头，香港基准股票指数将迎来技术性牛市。【原文：Hong Kong’s benchmark equity index headed for a technical bull market as stocks in the city extended this month’s stellar rebound sparked by overseas inflows.】

item.title: 乐观情绪升温，中国房地产股引领市场反弹
item.description: 一家大型开发商与债券持有人就流动性问题达成解决方案后，市场情绪得到提振，中国房地产股大涨，领涨大盘。【原文：Chinese property shares surged, leading gains in the broader market, as sentiment got a boost after a major developer reached a solution with bondholders for its liquidity issues.】

item.title: 中国推动香港 IPO 的新计划面临重大障碍
item.description: 中国誓言鼓励国内领先企业在香港上市，这有助于刺激价值 5 万亿美元的股票市场出现罕见的大涨，但交易商们并不准备转而乐观。【原文：China’s vow to encourage the nation’s leading companies to list in Hong Kong is helping spur a rare surge in the $5 trillion stock market, but dealmakers aren’t ready to turn optimistic.】

item.title: 日元对美元汇率自 1990 年以来首次跌破 160 点
item.description: 自 1990 年以来，日元首次跌破另一个心理里程碑，这引发了人们的疑问：为什么日本当局似乎没有出手支持日元？【原文：The yen tumbled past yet another psychological milestone for the first time since 1990, raising questions about why the Japanese authorities don’t appear to have stepped in to support the currency.】

item.title: 路易-德雷福斯以高价收购澳大利亚Namoi公司，在Olam公司中拔得头筹
item.description: 农产品贸易商路易达孚公司（Louis Dreyfus Co.【原文：Agricultural commodities trader Louis Dreyfus Co. has sweetened its offer for Namoi Cotton Ltd. with a takeover bid that values the Australian processor at A$125 million ($82 million), topping a rival proposal from a unit of Olam Group last month.】

item.title: 人民币贬值争论浮出水面，交易员权衡下一次外汇冲击
item.description: 金融市场上有越来越多的猜测，认为中国将需要采取一种极端的、极具争议性的措施来支持其奄奄一息的经济，即大刀阔斧地让人民币贬值。【原文：There is modest yet mounting speculation in financial markets that China will need to take an extreme and highly controversial measure to support its moribund economy — devalue the yuan in a big-bang move.】

item.title: 富达认为卢比是最适合进行套利交易的货币，原因是印度央行的严格控制
item.description: 据富达国际（Fidelity International）称，印度央行对卢比的严格控制增加了该货币对利差交易的吸引力。【原文：The Indian central bank’s tight grip on the rupee is boosting the allure of the currency for carry trades, according to Fidelity International.】

item.title: 在比尔-盖茨的支持下，沙特阿拉伯朝觐者的健康状况得到改善，疾病得到控制
item.description: 在比尔-盖茨基金会（Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation）的支持下，6 月份前往沙特阿拉伯朝圣的朝圣者将获得健康保障，这也是根除脊髓灰质炎的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Hajj pilgrims heading to Saudi Arabia in June will get a health boost under a Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation-supported disease control drive that’s part of a broader effort to eradicate polio.】

item.title: 收益率差距扩大，中国债券躲过全球债务大跌
item.description: 中国的主权债券再次躲过了全球债务市场的大跌，展示了其经常被投资者提及的吸引力之一：与全球同类债券的低相关性。【原文：China’s sovereign bonds have once again dodged a rout in the global debt market, showcasing one of their frequently cited attractions for investors — a low correlation with their worldwide peers.】

item.title: 美国强劲通胀打消降息预期，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 黄金在一周下跌后趋于稳定，因为交易员们期待着美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）周中的会议，在这次会议上，决策者们预计将重申长期维持较高利率的立场。【原文：Gold steadied after a weekly drop as traders looked ahead to a US Federal Reserve meeting midweek at which policymakers are expected to reaffirm their stance for higher-for-longer interest rates.】
